title: Can not add new user to a project
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/chakki-works/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

<!-- Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Create a new project as the admin user, create a new test user and assign all permission to that user, try viewing the project created by the admin user as the new user.

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: Mac Mojave
*   Python Version Used: 3.7
*   When you install doccano: yesterday
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): docker-compose

I am unable to add a new 'test' user to my test project.

Here is the user setup with all permissions granted.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8621935/69290384-a0eb1080-0bb4-11ea-8ab4-a3b8ba90d0bd.png)



Here is an example of the project with collaborative annotation enabled.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8621935/69290334-83b64200-0bb4-11ea-9c03-7e28e1347e76.png)

However, when I log in as the 'test' user, I do not see the project.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8621935/69290408-b6f8d100-0bb4-11ea-836c-0bc491a16a6f.png)


When I log in as the admin user, I can see this project.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8621935/69290419-c546ed00-0bb4-11ea-9d55-466ec0c9f366.png)


Any help is appreciated
!
